oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Judaeo-Arabic text, both in Hebrew and Arabic script: The Hebrew words usually in Hebrew characters, the Arabic text in Arabic characters. Seems to be a biblical commentary? A small piece of paper, torn, shabby and worn-out. End of paragraphs (?) is marked by a dot surrounded by a circle. The text itself seems to be written in brown ink, but in two places another hand added a word between the lines and a vowel (qubutz mark) in black ink.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Judeo-Arabic text
